Translations.Text: sita arau graismakalara bhramanata sihamtara asakti ache
Eteke sihamte yena e'i gharara pratipalakara ibadata karae
Yijane sihamtaka ksudha arasthata khadya pradana karaiche arau santraasara paraa niraapatta diche
Tumi taka dekhichane yiye hicapa pratidanaka asbikara karae
si se'ijane'i, yiye anathaka kathorabharae khedi pathiyaya
arau si dukhiyaka khana khuraabalai utsaha nidiye
arau sarau-suraa grhasamagrai pradanata badha diye
Niscaya ami tomaka ala-ka'uchara pradana karaichom
Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara uddesye chalata adaya karaa arau korabani karaa
Niscaya tomara prati bidbesa posanakaraiye'i nirbansa
